Description: Pottery sherd from a jar. Dark slip with added white and orange painted bands.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: Probably found at el-Haraga, but confused with Kahun material. Kemp & Merrillees 1980, Minoan Pottery in Second Millennium Egypt, p. 82
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (A555.3)
Kemp & Merrillees 1980 / Minoan Pottery in Second Millennium Egypt (Ka.13) (p. 65)
